column4: hello, im looking for assistance with my webCam, it works but remains black and white....please help me with it
you need to adjust some rgb setting i think
have u tried ekiga? which application u using for webcam?
i tried ekiga and cheese and amsn and kopete.....all output a black and whit picture
can u try changing video output to maybe v4l2 in gstreamer-properties
lemme bring to ur attention in worked on ubuntu hardy perfectly, only after upgrade this happens
install a program called xawtv and adjust settings in it
if that fails try compile ur own driver http://linuxtv.org/hg/~pinchartl/uvcvideo/
